channel.title: XRevolutionz RSPS || 120 Dungeoneering || Fully Summoning || Korasi's || 24.7!
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/5Jtwf.png[/img][/center]
[center] Home Page - [ftp=ftp://xrevolutionz.hostoi.com/]Click Here To Go Homepage[/ftp] Webclient - [ftp=ftp://xrevolutionz.hostoi.com/forums/index.php?page=Webclient]Play Webclient Now[/ftp][/center]
[center][img]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Information.png[/img][/center]
XRevolutionz is a 317 based server loading 508+ data, We strive to be a huge success. I first started here at MoparScape in 2010 and have run many servers now. The Main Owner is Drakax. The Co Owner is Sir. The Web Developer is Kyle.
[center][img]http://lunarisle.com/Advert/Features.png[/img][/center]
- All Weapon Specials 100% - Overloads 100% - Flawless Switching - Death Cape - Fun PK - Real Drops - 508+ Data - Loads Of Bosses - Quick Prayer / Curses - Donator Icon Support - No Lag - 64GB Dedicated Server - Custom Interfaces - Symbols Support (<>^\/) - Superb Graphics - Player Clipping - NPC Clipping - Info In Quest Tab - Lottery System - Pickpocketing - Fantastic Skilling Area - Skillcapes With Emotes 100% - Donator, Super Donator, Mod, Admin, Owner Capes --- AND MUCH MORE!
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/zpcxy.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/aMhdp.png[/img][/center] [center][img]http://i.imgur.com/tsUpy.png[/img][/center]
More Will Coming Soon.
Thanks! Kyle
